009package Ch17_EdgePreservingSmoothing;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.NagaoMatsuyamaF.Parameters;
017import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.NagaoMatsuyamaFilterScalar;
018import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.NagaoMatsuyamaFilterVector;
019
020/**
021 * This plugin demonstrates the 5x5 Nagao-Matsuyama filter, as described in
022 * NagaoMatsuyama (1979). This plugin works for all types of images and stacks.
023 * @author WB
024 * @version 2014/03/16
025 */
026public class Nagao_Matsuyama_Filter implements PlugInFilter {
027        
028        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
029        private static boolean UseVectorFilter = false;
030        private boolean isColor;
031
032        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
033                        return DOES_ALL;
034        }
035        
036    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
037        isColor = (ip instanceof ColorProcessor);
038                if (!getParameters())
039                        return;
040                if (isColor && UseVectorFilter) {
041                        new NagaoMatsuyamaFilterVector(params).applyTo((ColorProcessor)ip);
042                }
043                else {
044                        new NagaoMatsuyamaFilterScalar(params).applyTo(ip);
045                }
046    }
047    
048    private boolean getParameters() {
049                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
050                gd.addNumericField("Variance threshold", params.varThreshold, 0);
051                if (isColor)
052                        gd.addCheckbox("Use vector filter", UseVectorFilter);
053                gd.showDialog();
054                if (gd.wasCanceled()) return false;
055                params.varThreshold = Math.max(gd.getNextNumber(),0);
056                if (isColor)
057                        UseVectorFilter = gd.getNextBoolean();
058                return true;
059    }
060    
061}
062
